name: Armed Zone
description:
Armed Zone is an intensive Third Person Cover Shooter game blended with team tactics and diverse combat. The gameplay content of Armed Zone is totally designed and developed by one person. This game not only boasts the typical TPS elements but also the core special gameplays, such as instant weapon customization, specialists system, hero abilities and so on. In Armed Zone, you will experience intense combat on ever-changing modern battlefields, constantly adjust your strategy, create your own tactics, and achieve the eventual victory.

Combat Cycle

Take advantages of all favorable conditions, analyze the attack strategies of different enemies, upgrade tactical equipment, utilize a variety of deadly weapons, face a wide variety of enemy units and survive infinite battle waves.

Multiplayer

Play against or with other players, defeat enemies by taking surprising actions in various map designs, get more kills or occupy target areas, focus on teamwork and adjust tactics, gain victories and unlock more content.

Your Battle, Your Way

Choose Special Forces soldiers equipped with various weapons and abilities. Stealth, Assualt, Suppress and more, there’s always a combat method for you. Instantly adapt your weapon attachments to the battlefield, deploy tactical or lethal gadgets to disrupt the enemy, deeply customize your own battle ways, and enjoy the combat.

Attention

  • This game is still in its early stages, so if you encounter any bugs, please feel free to contact me.
  • Future updates will be all free.
  • Buying me a coffee will speed up the updates, thanks for your support.
  • Good Hunting!
